item.title: Why People Act So Weirdly at Airports
item.description: Time and boundaries dissolve in these spaces while people become charged with stress, anxiety, and excitement. Throw in a drink or two, and it’s no wonder people aren’t themselves.
item.media:keywords: The Conversation, science, Airports, Travel, Air Travel, psychology
item.dc:creator: Steve Taylor
item.dc:subject: Feeling Flighty

item.title: Temu and Shein Raised Prices, Removed Products as Trump’s China Tariffs Went Into Effect
item.description: Sellers and shoppers on the two sites say they saw items disappear and prices go up after President Donald Trump implemented tariffs on Chinese imports.

item.title: Trump’s FBI Pick Kash Patel Took Up to $5M in Stock From Chinese Ecommerce Giant Shein
item.description: Donald Trump’s pick for FBI director told senators he has no plans to divest his shares, which his financial disclosure form says were received in exchange for consulting services.
item.media:keywords: government, Donald Trump, China, Shein, FBI
item.dc:creator: Louise Matsakis

item.title: 2025: The Year of the AI App

item.title: Google Lifts a Ban on Using Its AI for Weapons and Surveillance

item.title: Trump's Plan to Make European Cars More Expensive Has a Fatal Flaw
